
        Wymyślić własny przykład algorytmu niestablinego numerycznie.
        1. Zademostrować wersję niestabilną, pokazać, że działa źle.
        2. Wyjaśnić, dlaczego działa źle.

        Dla f(x) = sqrt(pow(x, 2) + 1) - 1
        dla wartości x bliskiej zeru ze względu na arytmetkę tracimy dokładność obliczeń.

        3. Zademonstować wersję stabilną.
        g(x) powstała z pomnożenia f(x) przez sprzężenie.



        Out:
        **********************************
         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^0
         f(x) = 1.10101000001001111001101*2^-2
         g(x) = 1.10101000001001111001101*2^-2
         g(x) - f(x) = 0

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-1
         f(x) = 1.11100011011101111001110*2^-4
         g(x) = 1.11100011011101111001110*2^-3
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11100011011101111001110*2^-4

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-2
         f(x) = 1.11111000001111011001101*2^-6
         g(x) = 1.11111000001111011001101*2^-4
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.01111010001011100011010*2^-4

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-3
         f(x) = 1.11111110000000111111011*2^-8
         g(x) = 1.11111110000000111111011*2^-5
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.10111110010000110111100*2^-5

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-4
         f(x) = 1.11111111100000000100000*2^-10
         g(x) = 1.11111111100000000100000*2^-6
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11011111100010000011110*2^-6

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-5
         f(x) = 1.11111111111000000000010*2^-12
         g(x) = 1.11111111111000000000010*2^-7
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11101111111000010000010*2^-7

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-6
         f(x) = 1.11111111111110000000000*2^-14
         g(x) = 1.11111111111110000000000*2^-8
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11110111111110000010000*2^-8

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-7
         f(x) = 1.11111111111111100000000*2^-16
         g(x) = 1.11111111111111100000000*2^-9
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111011111111100000010*2^-9

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-8
         f(x) = 1.11111111111111111000000*2^-18
         g(x) = 1.11111111111111111000000*2^-10
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111101111111111000000*2^-10

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-9
         f(x) = 1.11111111111111111110000*2^-20
         g(x) = 1.11111111111111111110000*2^-11
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111110111111111110000*2^-11

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-10
         f(x) = 1.11111111111111111111100*2^-22
         g(x) = 1.11111111111111111111100*2^-12
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111111011111111111100*2^-12

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-11
         f(x) = 1.11111111111111111111111*2^-24
         g(x) = 1.11111111111111111111111*2^-13
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111111101111111111111*2^-13

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-12
         f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-25
         g(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-13
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111111111000000000000*2^-14

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-13
         f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-27
         g(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-14
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111111111100000000000*2^-15

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-14
         f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-29
         g(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-15
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111111111110000000000*2^-16

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-15
         f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-31
         g(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-16
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111111111111000000000*2^-17

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-16
         f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-33
         g(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-17
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111111111111100000000*2^-18

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-17
         f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-35
         g(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-18
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111111111111110000000*2^-19

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-18
         f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-37
         g(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-19
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111111111111111000000*2^-20

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-19
         f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-39
         g(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-20
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111111111111111100000*2^-21

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-20
         f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-41
         g(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-21
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111111111111111110000*2^-22

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-21
         f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-43
         g(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-22
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111111111111111111000*2^-23

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-22
         f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-45
         g(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-23
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111111111111111111100*2^-24

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-23
         f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-47
         g(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-24
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111111111111111111110*2^-25

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-24
         f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-49
         g(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-25
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.11111111111111111111111*2^-26

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-25
         f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-51
         g(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-26
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-26

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-26
         f(x) = 0 is subnormal
         g(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-27
         g(x) - f(x) = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-27

         x = 1.00000000000000000000000*2^-27
         f(x) = 0 is subnormal
